TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class HttpMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class HttpMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 如果使用 HTTP-GET 或 HTTP-POST 将此特性应用于 XML Web services 客户端，则可设置特定的类型，它们对发送到 XML Web services 方法的参数进行序列化并从 XML Web services 方法读取响应。

span.span: Applying this attribute to an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, sets the types that serialize the parameters sent to an XML Web service method and read the response from the XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服务客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法使用 HTTP GET，必须设置为`XmlReturnReader`和设置为`UrlParameterWriter`。If an XML Web service client calls an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, must be set to `XmlReturnReader` and set to `UrlParameterWriter`. XML Web 服务客户端调用 XML Web 服务使用 HTTP POST 必须设置到`XmlReturnReader`和到`HtmlFormParameterWriter`。XML Web service clients invoking a XML Web service using HTTP-POST must set to `XmlReturnReader` and to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`. ## Examples 下面的示例是用于调用 XML Web 服务实用程序使用 HTTP POST Wsdl.exe 实用工具所生成的代理类。The following example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for calling an XML Web service utility using HTTP-POST. Wsdl.exe 自动提供的正确类型和，以及指定的代理类继承自。The Wsdl.exe automatically supplies the correct types for and , along with specifying that the proxy class inherits from . [!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它对从 XML Web services 客户端发送到 XML Web services 方法的参数进行序列化。

span.span: A that serializes parameters sent from an XML Web service client to an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服务客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法使用 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST必须`XMLReturnReader`。If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, must be `XMLReturnReader`. ## Examples 该示例是 XML Web 服务客户端使用 HTTP GET，设置由 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的代理类到所需的值的`XMLReturnReader`。The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting to the required value of `XMLReturnReader`. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 一个 ，它对来自 XML Web services 方法的响应进行反序列化。

span.span: A that deserializes the response from an XML Web service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服务客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法使用 HTTP GET，必须`UrlParameterWriter`，而客户端使用 HTTP POST 必须设置到`HtmlFormParameterWriter`。If the XML Web service client is invoking an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET, must be `UrlParameterWriter`, whereas a client using HTTP-POST must set to `HtmlFormParameterWriter`. ## Examples 该示例是 XML Web 服务客户端使用 HTTP GET，设置由 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的代理类到所需的值的`UrlParameterWriter`。The example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for an XML Web service client using HTTP-GET, setting to the required value of `UrlParameterWriter`.
